item.title: Cloud Build Series #1: Automatic deployment to Google Kubernetes Services with Cloud Build
item.description: By twahyono Prerequisites You have Google Cloud account login You have Google Cloud SDK installed locally Enable billing for your project You must activate Kubernetes Engine API, Cloud Build API, Repository API Sample project provided at sample Creating New Kubernetes Cluster Create new cluster with f1-micro machine type. For this trial purpose we will use preemptible machine to keep the cost down. Preemptible means we are using spare capacity available from GCP to create node.
